name: PhotogrammetrySample
desc: An object that represents one image and its corresponding metadata.

items.name: let id: Int
items.desc: A unique identifier for the sample.

items.name: typealias PhotogrammetrySample.ID
items.desc: The datatype for the sample’s unique identifier.

items.name: var id: ObjectIdentifier
items.desc: The stable identity of the entity associated with this instance.

items.name: let image: CVPixelBuffer
items.desc: The image data for this sample.
